languages.text: "Мне стало известно, что рычаг подачи топлива на мостике может быть неисправен. Почему я долж{mf|ен|на} контролировать вашу работу, Равор?"

traits.locale_text: "Мне стало известно, что рычаг подачи топлива на нижних палубах может быть неисправен. Почему я долж{mf|ен|на} контролировать вашу работу, Равор?"

languages.text: "Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"
languages.original_text: "Мне стало известно, что рычаг подачи топлива на мостике может быть неисправен. Почему я долж{mf|ен|на} контролировать вашу работу, Равор?"

traits.locale_text: "It has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the lower decks may be defective. Why should I be supervising your performance, Ravor?"
"It has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the lower decks may be defective. Why should I be supervising your performance, Ravor?"
"It has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Why should I be supervising your performance, Ravor?"
"It has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Why should I be supervising your performance, Ravor?"
"Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"
"Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"

languages.text: "Ravor, ich habe erfahren, dass möglicherweise ein Treibstoffhebel auf der Brücke defekt ist. Könnt Ihr Eure Pflichten wirklich nicht ohne meine ständige persönliche Aufsicht erfüllen?"
languages.original_text: "Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe erfahren, dass möglicherweise ein Treibstoffhebel auf der Brücke defekt ist. Warum sollte ich Eure Arbeit überprüfen, Ravor?"

languages.text: « Ravor, on m'a signalé qu'un levier à carburant de la passerelle serait défectueux. Faut-il que je vous surveille en permanence pour que vous fassiez votre travail ? »
languages.original_text: "Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"

traits.locale_text: « On m'a signalé qu'un levier à carburant de la passerelle serait défectueux. Faut-il que je surveille votre travail, Ravor ? »

languages.text: “雷沃，我发现舰桥上的燃料控制杆可能出了问题。像这样的事情真的要我来操心吗？没有我的监督，你就做不好你的工作吗？”
languages.original_text: "Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"

traits.locale_text: “我注意到，舰桥上的燃料控制杆可能出了问题。你真的需要我来监督你的工作吗，雷沃？”

languages.text: 「ラヴォア、ブリッジの燃料レバーが故障しているようだな。私の監視なしでは仕事も遂行出来ないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"

traits.locale_text: 「ラヴォア、ブリッジの燃料レバーが故障しているようだな。私の監視なしじゃ仕事も遂行出来ないのか？」

languages.text: «Ravor, ha llegado a mi atención que hay una palanca de combustible defectuosa en el puente. Dígame, ¿por qué tengo que supervisar personalmente su trabajo?».
languages.original_text: "Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"

traits.locale_text: «He detectado una palanca de combustible del puente defectuosa. Dígame, ¿por qué tengo que supervisar su trabajo, Ravor?».

languages.text: "Ravor, dikkatimi çekti de köprüdeki yakıt kollarından biri arızalı gibi. Vazifeni icra etmen için illa bizzat mı teftiş etmem gerekiyor?"
languages.original_text: "Ravor, it has come to my attention that a fuel lever on the bridge may be defective. Can you not be trusted to carry out your duties without my personal oversight?"

traits.locale_text: "Ravor, dikkatimi çekti de köprüdeki yakıt kollarından biri arızalı gibi. Vazifeni icra etmen için illa bizzat mı teftiş etmem gerekiyor?"
